questions_1.question:
The idle speed system is designed to schedule speed at idle in order to hold a constant thrust level regardless of outside air temperature.
   ● On a cold day, speed decreases.
   ● On a hot day, speed increases.
questions_1.correctFeedback:
That's Correct!

You have chosen the correct option.
